name: bms-web-platform
description: Monorepo for the Battery Management System web platform including frontend, API, and realtime engine.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix packages/frontend start" "npm --prefix packages/api start" "npm --prefix packages/realtime-engine start"
scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/frontend run build && npm --prefix packages/api run build && npm --prefix packages/realtime-engine run build
